recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400F. Coat 12 muffin cups with cooking spray.
In a large bowl, stir together flour, sugars, baking powder, and salt.

In another bowl, stir together milk, eggs, butter, and vanilla until blended. Make a well in center of dry ingredients. Add milk mixture and stir just to combine. Stir in chocolate chips and spoon batter into prepared muffin cups.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until a cake tester inserted in center of one muffin comes out clean. Remove muffin tin to wire rack. Cool for 5 minutes. Remove from tins to finish cooling
